known_issues: Customer booking link fare/distance calculator shows round-trip (250km) pricing when user selects/enters a one-way trip of 130km.

existing_features.title: Fix the Trip Total Calculator so that when the user selects the one-way trip type and enters 130 km, the calculated amount is based on one-way pricing (and one-way minimum coverage if applicable) rather than round-trip minimum coverage (250 km).

projectName: Fix customer booking trip calculator using round-trip minimum distance for one-way trips
